h2_title: Yellow Loong and Transformation Spell: Golden Lining
content: Defeating him will reward you with a powerful Transformation Spell called Golden Lining, where you can become Yellow Loong and use his shock-infused long combo attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Loong and Transformation Spell: Golden Lining'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating him will reward you with a powerful Transformation Spell called Golden Lining, where you can become Yellow Loong and use his shock-infused long combo attacks.
